title: @KateyKhaos- In regards to Firecracker Jinx
body: Seriously, why didn't you change the jokes? It's a dragon, not a fish. I understand not giving her a full VO, but that joke is just theme killing. It's like Reaper Soraka using her ult and saying "Live!" (that was a deciding point for me not getting that skin). Couldn't we have at least just edited out "fishbones"?

replies.body: We didn't change the joke because Fishbones is the name of her rocket.
You don't think it interferes with fishbones being a dragon at all?

> [{quoted}](name=The AFK Farmer,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=hJBEUotE,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-01-29T02:18:02.885+0000)
>
> You don't think it interferes with fishbones being a dragon at all?

Personally, no, because her gun's names are Pow Pow and Fishbones. It's not like she was calling him a fish, so it doesn't bother me.

Don't listen to him!!  I have come across many posts from this guy and he is, IMO, one of the biggest tools of the community.  Your team is awesome and we are thankful for finally having another Jinx skin :)

What?You don't call your dog Kitty?

Plus,Jinx is crazy.She got a doctor's note.
Whenever I see a post from you, I always assume I am going to downvote it even before I read it.  Sure enough, you never fail.
Thank you for confirming that I do in fact have a downvote wagon.
Keep in mind that I do actually read what you write and don't just downvote whenever I see your name.  You are just an extremely rude and whiny individual and everything you post is downvote worthy.

Meanwhile....

{{champion:24}} with various skins: Imagine if I had a REAL weapon.
If I put a Santa costume on my dog his name would still be Charlie.
